text:
Katie Price sarcastically destroys her critics after backlash over 'Merry Xmas' window display The star wasn't going to take any flack for this one   Share   Comments By Alistair McGeorge 23:11, 17 FEB 2017 Celebs Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Next This Morning: Katie Price admits Peter Andre woul Watch this video again Watch Next Katie Price confesses glamour model career was du 0:31 Katie Price gets glammed up for the Fifty Shades 1:36 David Brent's iconic dance 0:26 Two Kentucky sheriff's fight in front of prisoners 1:52 Emmerdale tease fans about Robert and Aaron's wed 0:57 Viewers brand The Chase contestants as the 'dumbe 0:46 Video will play in  Katie Price claims Happy Xmas sign is up because of Harvey Share this video Watch Next   Share   Comments Get celebs   Katie Price has delivered a sarcastic response to her critics for still having "Merry Xmas" spray painted on her windows at home.
The former glamour model hit back at the backlash in a blunt Instagram video on Friday night, following a number of fans asking why she hasn't simply had it cleaned off in the weeks after Christmas.
With her husband Kieran Hayler sitting in view, she filmed the window and ranted as she explained the reason behind the decorated still being on display.
Katie Price still has the message on her window She said: "I’d just like to show everyone YES we’ve still got Happy Christmas up on the windows, and everyone is saying ‘ooh why have they got Happy Christmas up?’
“Number one because we celebrate Christmas every day – no we don’t really.
"But number two, every time we go to take it off Harvey goes and gets the hump with it as when you're autistic, you're used to normal things - and change it affects you."
She said it's to make things easier for Harvey (Photo: Rex Features) Keeping her brilliant, sassy tone, she added: "But we will take it down in time. Thank you for listening to my explanation."
Meanwhile, Katie headed out for a double date Valentine’s Day meal this week with her husband Kieran and their neighbours Julian and Joanne Mantell.
Katie and Kieran (Photo: officialkatieprice/Instagram) Keiran with the neighbour (Photo: officialkatieprice/Instagram) But as Katie shared a photo of her husband Kieran with her friend Joanne – cruel trolls commented that she looked just like love cheat Jane Poutney . 
“Great night with friends,” Katie commented as she started sharing selfies from her unconventional Valentine’s night out.
“She does look like that Jane 100% keep your eye on that,” a follower commented.
